This is a multi-part message.  This line is ignored.
--MyBoundary
Header1: value1
HEADER2: value2
foo-bar: baz

My value
The end.
--MyBoundary
name: bigsection

[longline]
--MyBoundary
Header1: value1b
HEADER2: value2b
foo-bar: bazb

Line 1
Line 2
Line 3 ends in a newline, but just one.

--MyBoundary

never read data
--MyBoundary--


useless trailer
